content:
Heads up: The compiler team is removing all uses of in_band_lifetimes from the compiler since the feature may be removed. I've opened a similar issue for rustdoc which has been claimed. Just wanted to let you know; I don't think there should be any problem with removing it especially since it's being removed from the compiler.

Issue: #92368

Thanks! The FCP to remove it completed, so these cleanups are much appreciated.

Good to see it wasn't too painful of a change, too.
